title: Augusta County: Tony Pastor to Annie Harris, September 23, 1862
summary: Writing to his lady friend Annie, Tony describes a recent successful march into Maryland, including the capture of Harper's Ferry. He mentions a great ensuing battle but says he has no time to discuss it in detail.
keywords: African Americans, Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Medicine/Hospitals, Military Strategy, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, American Civil War
